name: Bridge-toggle mazes
description:
A baffling logic maze with minimal information to get you started.  First deduce the logic - then solve the maze.

  • Number of puzzles: 7
  • Average play time: 40 mins 
  • First published: April 2021 (itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart. 
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

For more clickmazes puzzles visit: http://www.clickmazes.com
